CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In particular , PQCDTB exhibited higher FFs compared with poly[carbazole-alt-benzothiadiazole] ( PCZDTB ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| poly[carbazole-alt-benzothiadiazole] (PCZDTB) |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "PQCDTB" and "poly[carbazole-alt-benzothiadiazole] (PCZDTB)". These are the names of two materials being compared in terms of their Frontier Fractal Dimensions (FFs).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

In this revised list, the two entities "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB" are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. The parentheses around "PCZDTB" were removed to simplify the presentation, but the entity name remains the same as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In particular , PQCDTB exhibited higher FFs compared with poly[carbazole-alt-benzothiadiazole] ( PCZDTB ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| higher FFs |
| poly[carbazole-alt-benzothiadiazole] ( PCZDTB ) |

Explanation:

* "PQCDTB" is mentioned as having higher FFs, so it is a Property Value entity.
* "higher FFs" is mentioned in comparison to PQCDTB, so it is a Property Value entity.
* "poly[carbazole-alt-benzothiadiazole] ( PCZDTB )" is mentioned as having lower FFs compared to PQCDTB, so it is a Property Value entity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| higher FFs |
| lower FFs |

Explanation:

* "PQCDTB" and "poly[carbazole-alt-benzothiadiazole] ( PCZDTB )" are not Property Value entities, as they are names of materials, not values of material properties.
* "higher FFs" and "lower FFs" are Property Value entities, as they are values of material properties (FFs stands for "fluorescence efficiencies" or "field-effect mobilities", which are material properties).
